title: a new journey to test the email content for promocode

cart_abandon_email_content.author: Jessica Ramesch
cart_abandon_email_content.body_para_first:
You recently saw Charles Mizrahi’s presentation on the electric vehicle battery revolution…

In it, he revealed how the Forever Battery is predicted to cause a 1.500% surge in EV sales over the next 4 years…

And how that tailwind will cause one secretive company’s stock to skyrocket.
cart_abandon_email_content.body_para_second:
But you somehow got bumped off the order form and you still don’t have access to his two new reports … The Forever Battery: How to Profit as EV Sales Grow 1.500% Over the Next 4 Years … and A New Era of Energy Storage: The Hottest Breakthrough of the 21st Century.

I’d really hate for you to miss out on this. I know you were interested before … because you had started filling out the order form.

SoI want to give you one last chance
cart_abandon_email_content.body_para_final:
Remember you get:

One-year membership to Alpha Investor.

Twelve monthly issues.

Access to the model portfolio.

Weekly alerts and updates.

The Alpha Investor Investing Manual.

Access to a private members-only website.

A dedicated customer care team.

And of course most important of all your free copy of The Forever Battery: How to Profit as EV Sales Grow 1 500% Over the Next 4 Years … and A New Era of Energy Storage: The Hottest Breakthrough of the 21st Century.

That’s $199 in value for only $47.

But this is your last chance to be taken directly back to the order page so you can finish filling it out. You don’t want to miss this opportunity.

Sincerely

Brandt Huseman Director of Customer ExperienceAlpha Investor
cart_abandon_email_content.preheader: I hope this email finds you well
